bibl.note: The volume has its origins in the 'Tragic Fragments' conference held at the University of Exeter in September 1996. 10 contributions. - Pp. 1-6: Introduction; - 209-226: Bibliography; - 227-241: Index of fragmentary plays and other passages cited; - 243-248: General index.
McHARDY Fiona, James ROBSON and David HARVEY (Edd.), Lost Dramas of Classical Athens. Greek Tragic Fragments.
Exeter, Exeter University Press, 2005, 8°, viii-248 pp. ISBN 0-85989-752-4. £40.
